line.text: 'Autopilot to last known position! The hunt is on...'

line.comment: * DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
* NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.

line.text: 'There is no bounty at the moment.'
'Total destruction of a freighter will put a cumulative bounty of '
' for each fighter hot-drop. And they might clear high bounties at their base.'
'Pirate Gang Leaders have an extra bounty.'
'Clicking on a ship tells autopilot to move to last known position.'

sval.val: Autopilot to last known position! The hunt is on...
There is no bounty at the moment.
Total destruction of a freighter will put a cumulative bounty of
for each fighter hot-drop. And they might clear high bounties at their base.
Pirate Gang Leaders have an extra bounty.
Clicking on a ship tells autopilot to move to last known position.
DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.
